text: Hi, does anybody know how I can preview a webpage if I'm using Content staging? We're doing a redesign/rebuild of the whole webpage. Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
If you are editing the page, there should be an eye icon on left column. Click and there is a preview link
<@UD53A9UUR> Ok, and if I would like to preview the whole redesign - just not a single page?
you would just need your navigation menus and in page links to be linking to the staging site
whether that’s a good idea for you, that’s up to you. you may have to fix some of those links at launch
Any pointers/recommendations on the best way to implement a notification notice ("topbar") that'd appear on all pages unless a cookie was set? (Similar to GDPR notices, but for more generic use.)
if that's interesting feature for you <@UD99GDS68>, make sure to post it in <http://ideas.HubSpot.com> :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UD99GDS68> smart content is something we’re thinking about. Right now as it’s been a popular ask among our customers. How are you solving for that right now? What solution are you using?
